title: Why does my Discussion get deleted ??
body:
I started 3 Discussions about match making and how it sucks and then it got deleted :/
why does this happen ?

replies.body: Hey there, if your thread is ever moderated you will receive a notification.  You will find it as the ! icon on the top right of the boards site.  Matchmaking feedback is best posted on the [Gameplay ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)boards, as support doesn't have visibility on development.
